Application.title: Application
Application.description:
This is the Application_c record that will be updated and is the Application variable and the specific Application from the Update Application Prompt
Format: 18 digit ID
Input from the Update Application Prompt

BadFit.title: BadFit
BadFit.description:
What requirements/ Skills missing: where might this candidate possibly be missing or lacking for this specific job spec
Format: Long Text
The input is retrieved from the Update Application Prompt where it will say: What requirements/ Skills missing:

GoodFit.title: GoodFit
GoodFit.description:
What makes applicant a good fit for this specific job spec
Format: Long Text
The input is retrieved from the Update Application Prompt where it will say: What makes applicant a good fit

Job_Spec.title: Job_Spec
Job_Spec.description:
This is the Job_Spec that the Applicant applied
Format: 18 digit ID
Input from the Update Application Prompt

Overview.title: Overview
Overview.description:
Overview of Candidate: Give an short overview of the Candidate highlighting the number of years experience, overview of their job history, and anything else that would make this a good 
Format: Long Text
The input is retrieved from the Update Application Prompt where it will say: Overview of Candidate:

Rating.title: Rating
Rating.description:
Application Rating: What would you score the applicant out of ten for this Job Spec
Format: Number
The input is retrieved from the Update Application Prompt where it will say: Application Rating:

recordId.title: recordId
recordId.description:
This is the Candidate__c record Id that applied for the Job Spec
Format: 18 digit ID (not email address)
Input from the Update Application Prompt 
Input:Application.Candidate__r.Id
